column1: "...Had  they  followed  the  proper  procedure  petitioners  would  have  got  an
opportunity to air their grievances. Failure on the part of the authorities to follow
the  procedure  deprived  the  petitioners  of  that  opportunity.  One  pillar  of  the
doctrine of Natural Justice is the right to a fair hearing before an administrative
authority acts or makes decisions affecting the rights of subjects..
